description: It’s been a while but we’ve got a double-winner this week from Thad, with a comment that took both first place for insightful and second place for funny, in response to the 9-0 Supreme Court ruling about Abrego Garcia: Wow, I never realized that Thomas, Alito, and all three of Trump’s appointees were Marxists. In […]
title: Funniest/Most Insightful Comments Of The Week At Techdirt
